note: These statuses can change at anytime even if the faction owner doesn't request them to be. Note that both Official and Unofficial factions are listed.

definitions.meaning: They need to be authorized in order to enter the Vault.
Can freely enter the Vault without authorization and will be protected from the Vault.
Reserved for Factions who raid frequently, they are not permitted to enter the Vault at any times. NOT KoS
They are considered by Vault Security and any other Vault official KoS.
